scanner.instruction: Point your camera at a plant QR code. When it’s recognized, the app will open that plant automatically.
scanner.hint1: Each plant has its own QR code. You can save it, print it as a small label, attach it to the pot, and scan it here to open the plant instantly.
scanner.qrPath1: Plants → tap a plant → Plant Details
scanner.qrPath2: Plants → tile menu → Show QR code
scanner.permissionHint: Enable camera access in system settings to scan QR codes.
